data.eml:eml: Gluphisia irene, a new species (Lepidoptera, Notodontidae) from China and some taxonomical remarks about the palaearctic Gluphisia Boisduval, 1828

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saldaitis, Aidas, Pekarsky, Oleg (2016): Gluphisia irene, a new species (Lepidoptera, Notodontidae) from China and some taxonomical remarks about the palaearctic Gluphisia Boisduval, 1828. Zootaxa 4169 (2): 381-386, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4169.2.10
